mapper.select: select p.imagename, p.product_name, (oi.count * p.price) as total_product_price, oi.count as total_product_quantity from orders o join order_item oi on o.order_id = oi.order_id join product p on oi.product_id = p.product_id where o.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (email, address, zipcode, order_time, order_status, total_price) VALUES (#{email}, #{address}, #{zipcode}, #{order_time}, #{order_status}, #{total_price})
